FAQ_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Everything you need to know about creating your perfect mouse
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_1: What materials can I use to make my custom mouse?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_1: Our app supports a wide range of materials including plastic, metal, wood, and even eco-friendly options. You can choose based on your preferences for durability, weight, and aesthetics.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_2: Can I customize the shape and size of my mouse?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_2: Absolutely! Our app allows you to adjust the dimensions, contours, and overall shape of your mouse to ensure the perfect fit for your hand and usage style.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_3: How do I add buttons and scroll wheels to my design?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_3: Our intuitive interface lets you easily add and position buttons and scroll wheels. You can choose from various types and even create custom functions for each component.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_4: Is it possible to create a wireless mouse design?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_4: Yes, you can design both wired and wireless mice. For wireless designs, you can specify battery type, wireless technology (Bluetooth or RF), and sensor specifications.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_5: How long does it take to receive my custom-made mouse?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_5: Once you've finalized your design, production and shipping typically take 2-3 weeks. We'll keep you updated on your order status throughout the process.
ACCORDION_ANSWER_1: MouseMaker is an innovative app that allows users to design and customize their own computer mice. With our intuitive interface, you can create a mouse that perfectly fits your hand and style preferences.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_2: How does the customization process work?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_2: Our app guides you through a step-by-step process where you can choose the shape, size, button layout, and color scheme of your mouse. You can also select from various materials and add personalized engravings.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_3: Can I order the mouse I design?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_3: Absolutely! Once you're satisfied with your design, you can place an order directly through the app. We use advanced 3D printing technology to bring your custom mouse to life and ship it right to your doorstep.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_4: What if I'm not satisfied with my custom mouse?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_4: We offer a 30-day satisfaction guarantee. If you're not completely happy with your MouseMaker creation, you can return it for a full refund or work with our design team to make adjustments and create a replacement at no additional cost.
